name: Dark House Escape Horror
description:
Escape from the house available 2 ending and scary.In this game you have to escape from being chased by a mad woman due to depression. Here you are given a choice, which is to run away from your house or by car

There are levels, namely:

Easy

Normal

Hard

Extremes

Nightmare

Spesial credit thanks for logo games from catcalyststuff/Freepik
